author: peskypunk9516
content: are there still plans to support eWasm in Eth 2.0?

author: m.kalinin
content: Not on L1. Potentially, there could be an L2 solution supporting eWasm. Note that Eth2.0 term is no longer used. We have Merge (Bellatrix), Withdrawals, Sharding and other network upgrades on consensus layer in the roadmap which previously were developed under Eth2.0 umbrella. One of the posts about deprecating Eth2 term https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/03/11/finalized-no-23/

author: peskypunk9516
content: got it, thanks for the fast response!
